attributes.action: Change child maintenance system. It should help the participating parent.
attributes.additional_details: Also, when the other parent goes on benefits they should still be made to pay any payments missed. A single parent can not financially support a child by themselves and the other non participating parent should contribute whether working or on benefits.
attributes.background: Child maintenance lacks in communicating with the parents who are struggling being a single parent. They do not communicate effectively when something on their case has changed or when no payments are being received.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about child maintenance payments but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what change you would like made.
